resources.string: The public and private testkeys are missing. Please relaunch the application to initiate the keys.
1. Specify the Package you want to sign.\n2. Specify the Output destination and name.\n3. Hit the Sign button to start signing it.

You can browse for the package by pressing the Package button and as well as for the output by pressing the Output button.\n\nNOTE: The specified output will be overwritten once the signing process is started.
For the source code to support Sun\'s security API dependency from the ZipSigner app source.
For the original SignApk source code used in their project. Modified to be able to work on this application
For the Simple Android File Browser library. A lightweight Android file browser used to support browsing of packages.
Commons IO library by Apache used to automatically generate the output package name.
You haven\'t specified a package yet.
You haven\'t specified an output yet.
